name: Be-be-bears!
description:
Many fun and surprising events with the beloved characters await your child! Explore the colorful world of the game for boys and girls alike!

Travel through a three-dimensional interactive enchanted forest where captivating entertainment awaits your child at every turn. Along your way you'll find interactive items which will allow your child to satisfy their eagerness to explore and discover safely.

With a tap of your finger, the friends spring to life and set out on a fascinating journey filled with happy meetings, engaging quests, and educational entertainment!

Educational mini-games are fun and contribute to children’s development!
• Inventing is fun! Help Bucky build a boat;
• There's so much to see in the forest! Take your camera and join the bears on a photo hunt;
• Cleaning can be fun too! Help tidy up in Bjorn's room;
• The forest looks beautiful in fall! Clear the colorful leaves off the playground;
• The lake will keep you busy even in winter! Feed the hungry fish;
• There's a lot of snow! Clear the snow from Bjorn's backyard.

The App Store’s Best of 2016. The App Store’s team named the educational mobile game Be-be-bears one of the best projects of 2016.
